And a bit heating while playing games and its normal for every metal bodied phone.Waterproof: no warranty for water damages. I didn't test waterproof but it is water-resistance.Display is v good bright and vibrant. One hand use is perfect.Style is v good. go for Sterling blue color. Buy a cover too cause back is glass too.Speaker output is also v good. Loud and very clear. Headphones are also v good.Great value for money I bought it on great indian festival I got it for RS 12300. For that money it values v much.***

cust_review: Best phone.... An iPhone is an iPhone... Like no other!***Finally I decided to go with Apple as it now has an LED screen instead of IPS LCD screens that Iphone 8+ and previous versions had.. ( I also used my dads iphoneX for around 2 months and decided to go for this when I was convinced) Though it is expensive, i believe its worth the money.. I feel its much more secure than Android and its not forcing me to have Facebook, Youtube etc that my Previous Samsung phones always did... Just to let y’ll know that I was a big fan of samsung.. I have used Note 1,2,3,4,8 S4, S7 edge etc.. Though its screen was good.. they use to slow down after some time of use.. I purchased an Apple only after positive reviews from my friends and I am loving this so far.. 3 GB RAM in iphone x or 4 GB RAM here in iPhone XS is far better than 6 GB ram in a Samsung.. I also play PUBG and I am also loving the Gaming experience.. Very important, it runs on High graphics mode where as my Note 8 use to work on medium graphics even when I used the mobile on Gaming, High performance or Entertainment mode... So, I am loving my iPhone so far..And the face ID is just awesome...***Too much .. just too much ‘heating ‘Same in hands as iPhone X***As a tech and apple enthusiast : This is one beautiful piece of tech and engineering marvel . From its seem less design to its attention to minute details (thx to the designing team behind it) , it will force you to agree that its insane price tag is justified the moment you hold it . I can never believe myself  of how much my views have changed about this product and Apple from it release to the moment I had it in my hands .Well if you want to know specs and comparisons well you have youtube , there are plenty of reviews there but if you are ready to buy such an expensive piece without selling your kidney then those reviews and comparisons don't matter to you I guess .My review :Camera : trustworthy , reliable , takes very aggressive HDR shots at times but generally neutral with its performance , you will find yourself editing the pictures a lot and I never complained it as I love doing it and when the base material is so detailed and accurate to begin with that you never lose any significant amount of quality after many editing cycles .Battery : Respectable AF ! Never expected this from a sub par capacity battery , while it is not the best , its at a very respectable position for sure  , it surely will surprise you once you use it .Speed : The king of phones in speed period .Design : 10/10Negatives - Face ID doesn't work in landscape , Charges slow .***Disappointed due the Camera of Xs (In low light/indoor photography face output will be totally artificial). In comparison with my old iPhone6s, I vote for 6s for low light/indoor photography. (I am not talking about selfie camera issue. I identified issue with main camera)Contacted Apple service centre and their response is “that is how iPhone X & iPhone Xs designed”Raised issue to Apple customer care number and shared the sample pics and other required data to analyse. Apple customer care came back to me after a week asking pictures by providing multiple scenarios. I have seen similar post for iPhone Xs MAX with the same issue in apple forum and the final response from Apple is: check lighting while taking pics.I am not sure why very less people has raised this issue in Xs Camera reviews (started digging more and observed in reviews only after facing the issue)Please note that, iPhone can’t be returned to Amazon without the approval from Apple. Apple don’t agree it’s as issue. Totally disappointed.This might be best Camera in some scenarios, but for me it’s a total disappointment.***Feeling cheated. Nothing wrong with the product. But i saw an ad on insta mentioning iphone xs max 256gb at 1.09 nd here i have an iphone xs 256gb.I dearly wanted an xs max model and now there are not ready to exchange even if i am ready to buy a new one.***Personally i feel the XS is a complete phone. My last Iphone 6 worked flawlessly for 3 yearsI was confused between note 9, xs, one plus 6T and other latest handsets.Finally chose IOS over android as it is more polished than android and the apps in my opinion work better on an IOSDid not go for the Max as i prefer the smaller size.Price is definitely high and i got it in a nice deal from amazon which knocked off 20k on the price tagPlus got free screen replacement cover, no interest EMITips:Wait for a SALE to get maximum savings. cust_review: The power bank worked well for less than 3 months. Then it stopped charging altogether. I called the customer care number and was told that since it is in warranty it will be replaced post checking at the service center. Service center first said.  It's charging. I told them to keep it on charge for a bit and see, it would not go beyond one light out of 4. They realized I was right and then proceeded to tell me that since there is a small dent in the corner on the body of the power bank they cannot replace it! Really? How come the dent didn't matter before they realised it was charging? On asking for their opinion on the situation in writing, they refused. Really bad service from Mi. Am never buying another Mi product again. They are cheats of the first order.***This is maybe my 10th personal power bank. I have used Anker, Adata, Plantronics, Ambrane, Intex, generic ones, iWalk and more. Most of them promise too much but by keeping the price tag low, you end up losing on genuine quality and assured performance. With the Mi Power Bank, you get what is promised. This is one difference that I noticed. The power bank was mostly charged when I needed it to be charged and after having used it for 30 days, I can safely say it has a great capacity of holding the charge.What phones & devices does this charge for me?S8 Plus, iPhone 8, Fitbit Blaze (once a week) and my Amazon Fire TV when I don't have a power plug to plug it.Does it fast charge?Yes, it fast charges the S8 Plus. This means it saves me the time and hassle of connecting with the wall charger. Yes, the wall charger is still little faster as wall charger uses 2.1 A charging and this uses 2.0 A charging (I think) but this is a major positive.Can it be used to charge two devices?The good news is that the 3-4 times I have used this with both devices, I have not seen any reduction in performance quality. It keeps the power going and seems to be able to support it. If its fast charging in one, then it is giving consistent charge to the other slot too.How often do I Charge it?Maybe once a week. Not more than a maximum of twice a week.Can it charge a macbook?I tried to use this and in one hour it only adds 12% to my Macbook Pro Touchbar 13" so it is not worth it.How long does it last?Lets say it will charge both my phones maybe 7-8 times in total before giving up.Who should get this?IF you have one phone and it dies easily, you should get this as this will keep it charged. I suggest you charge only till 85% and then disconnectif you have two phones, this is a good deviceHow long does it take to charge? I have never measured it. But with the accompanied cable and my Samsung Fast Charger Adapter, it charges in 6 hours to 100%. This is not bad for me as I plug it in overnight.Drawback? Mi is a Chinese company and I feel a little bad for using it. But the product is good if you forgive the political inferences. Thanks.***Been using this product for a week.Had bought it for my Redmi Note 5Pro which has a battery capacity of 4000 mAh.Now, things to keep in mind:1. Most important- Capacity of the battery is 20,000 mAh but actual power is 13000 mAh (As claimed by Mi on the website) due to conversion loss.So technically it should charge my Phone for 3 full cycles, so does it?The answer is YES, which is a big thumbs up from my side.2. can simultaneously charge 2 devices (just did a casual test, worked fine)3. Throughout the week I tested it for my phone only using a single port which triggered Qualcomm 3.0 fast charge & it heated my device (Not very much but acceptable).I have attached a screenshot of the quick charging icon visible when phone is connected to a single port on the powerbank4. cust_review: The power bank worked well for less than 3 months. Then it stopped charging altogether. They realized I was right and then proceeded to tell me that since there is a small dent in the corner on the body of the power bank they cannot replace it! Really? Am never buying another Mi product again. They are cheats of the first order.***This is maybe my 10th personal power bank. I have used Anker, Adata, Plantronics, Ambrane, Intex, generic ones, iWalk and more. Most of them promise too much but by keeping the price tag low, you end up losing on genuine quality and assured performance. With the Mi Power Bank, you get what is promised. This is one difference that I noticed. The power bank was mostly charged when I needed it to be charged and after having used it for 30 days, I can safely say it has a great capacity of holding the charge.What phones & devices does this charge for me?S8 Plus, iPhone 8, Fitbit Blaze (once a week) and my Amazon Fire TV when I don't have a power plug to plug it.Does it fast charge?Yes, it fast charges the S8 Plus. This means it saves me the time and hassle of connecting with the wall charger. Yes, the wall charger is still little faster as wall charger uses 2.1 A charging and this uses 2.0 A charging (I think) but this is a major positive.Can it be used to charge two devices?The good news is that the 3-4 times I have used this with both devices, I have not seen any reduction in performance quality. It keeps the power going and seems to be able to support it. If its fast charging in one, then it is giving consistent charge to the other slot too.How often do I Charge it?Maybe once a week. Not more than a maximum of twice a week.Can it charge a macbook?I tried to use this and in one hour it only adds 12% to my Macbook Pro Touchbar 13" so it is not worth it.How long does it last?Lets say it will charge both my phones maybe 7-8 times in total before giving up.Who should get this?IF you have one phone and it dies easily, you should get this as this will keep it charged. prod_des: Mi Air Purifier 2S comes with an ultra clear OLED display and can be controlled remotely via app - quiet and energy efficient.
feature: OLED display; Laser particle sensorAllergen and Odour free310m³ PM/hr CADR | Remote app control360 degree air intake with 3-layer filtration3 different modes to choose from (Auto, Night and Manual)OLED display (shows real-time PM2.5 concentration, temperature and humidity, Wi-Fi connection and working mode)Quiet and energy efficientWarranty: 1 year warranty provided by the manufacturer from date of purchasePower: 29 watts; Operating Voltage: 100 - 240 voltsIncludes: Air Purifier, Filter, User Guide, Power Cable
cust_review: The product seems to work well but look at both the Amazon and the MI.com website and the replacement filter is constantly out of stock- what's the point if one can't get the air filter easily***Filter remaining shows as 99% in couple of mins of first usage my pm level it was showing < 10 it's now showing 98% within just 4hrs usage. Pollution levels are way less than 30***Overall it looks good, easy to install and operate with scheduled or auto mode , good build quality etc but Price is on the upper side i think, 5-6K ideally.Now the review  - So I got it 3 weeks back and hardly used for 4-5 days. for the first two days i was excited with the features and display etc but later i found it of not much useful in Bangalore climate. the AQI reading is mostly between 20-45. it jumps from 20 to 40 in no time and vice versa in a partially closed room environment, not sure it should behave this way or an issue with the sensor.  the low AQI indicates good air quality so I am not worried much about turning it on everyday. one day it worked as expected when some kitchen smoke filled the room it shown red indicator and fan speed increased. I have experienced a sore throat after switching it on for full night for two days near my bed.Overall its useful for people stay in foggy area with worst air quality, current Bangalore climate doesn't warrant one, the upcoming winter might need though.***I was initially skeptical about this purifier - but so far it hasn't disappointed. Design is sleek and modern. Showed a PM2.5 of more than 300 (in Delhi house) and got it down to <70 within 30 minutes. The display also shows the remaining life of the filter (manual says it should last 3-6 months before a replacement is reuquired). There is also a night mode for more quiet operation.Wifi setup to the app is not as seamless as I would have liked - it took 3 attempts for it to finally connect to the app through the WiFi. However, app connectivity is not mandatory for its functioning. So not a big issue.Will need to see how durable it is in the long run, but so far I am happy with the purchase.***In 4 days the filter went from 100 to 97 percent.  I think we have to change the filter every two months at least for my usage. My room is totally air-conditionied room with and almost sound proof.  Even the value of quality of air was 1 or 2. Even though the filter is being consumed very aggressively.  I do not recommend.***Product looks nice and is portable. Its a clever design with circular filter.No need to change 2 separate filters as its all integrated into a single filter.Smart app to control and monitor your Air purifier.App will notify when the filter needs a replacement.Schedule the Purifier to turn on and off automatically at a given time.App sync is easy and is done within seconds( xiaomi probably fixed this issue as some customers were having trouble with the app )Pros:* All in one single cylindrical filter - Easiest replacement* Display sensor for PM 2.5 level, temperature and humidity* Smart App connection - Schedule the device to turn on and off and monitor it on your phone.* Replacement filter costs 2100/- and very easy to change in 30 seconds !* High CADR (Clean Air Delivery Rate) 310 m3/hrCons* Difficult to clean the filter* Noisy in manual mode***this is my second purchase. I own air 2 as well. There is definitely less polluted air when you leave it running overnight. You get to know about it by noticing transparent mucus in nose instead of black matter we generally notice while cleaning our nostrils.However, does it clean 99.97% pollutants. I don't think so, it takes lot of time (upto 2 hours) to bring down pollution under 100 in a 13 x 11 room (closed outdoor air vents/windows).Plus, take a look at closeup of air flow vent. I can see black dust building up on grill. If it was clean air, there would not be any residue build-up there.***#Pros- Easy to install, compact and easy to lift.- Elegant looking and blends nicely with the room interior.- Effective (Brings down the indoor air quality PM 2.5 level from ~210 to 60-70 within 15 minutes)- PM2.5 level indicator is realistic I guess (the level goes up if some it detects smoke)- Smart equipment and can be controlled through phone and tablet or even alexa :).- I found the child lock really useful as my kid is no longer able to tamper the physical buttons.Cons:- Not sure about the durability and after sales service though as, this is my first ever MI purchase.***

cust_review: Value for your money. It is not a Porsche, not even an Ambassador, but what is under the hood is enough to take you around. Use it sensibly, without loading the most-demanding games and resource-intensive apps, then this should last you a really long time. What surprises me is that even the next expensive tablet down the line (if you want a brand name, Samsung's basic tabs) would cost twice the price and with the same specs and still feel a little tacky.I was a little apprehensive regarding the feedback from several other uses on Amazon that they had had problems with responsiveness and/or trouble with lag or hangs. From personal experience, I see that it is not true. Yes, the tab is underpowered compared to all the fab tabs that you can buy for 4x-10x times the price of this one. Well, isn't that the point? To my mind, this is good enough for all the basic stuff, is quite responsive, does not trouble you with lags. The purpose of buying a tab matters. In this case it is for study and learning. So most videos run just fine, kids can play a few basic games, the audio is not great, but should not matter. You are getting more than your money's worth. Just don't expect to take it out for a spin like you need to push it to its limits - for that, buy a Porsche, go on, I know you want to do it..***Tab was delivered with 2MP rear camera and 0.3MP front camera, instead of 8MP rear and 2MP front cameras. Appears to be a deliberate attempt to betray the buyers.  Photos turned out to be pathetic. Screen has poor touch-sensitivity and requires hard-tapping on the icons***Amazon has hidden critical information in the product description section about the type of SIM slot available for a calling tab such as whether it is a micro SIM or Normal SIM. When contacted Amazon customer care all they provide following solutions for resolution.1. As Normal SIM does not FIT cut your SIM and put it.2. We cannot provide SIM information for Voice Calling tab and it is Lenovo's responsibility to provide the same.3. Call us before buying any product and check.Dont buy this product if you have a normal SIM and amazon service is pathetic as described above.***If you are aiming to buy a best performance tab at low cost then this is the one you need to buyTill this date not a single malfunctionBattery standby is very goodBelieve it or not never had a single issue with this lenovo tabThanks to Amazon***I gifted this irem to my 11 years old son..he is saying that picure wality is very bad.even battery back up..tab is heating....The said cemara pixals and sented pxals are mismatching....plz dont purchase. Product_name: Samsung Galaxy SM-R170NZKAINU Bluetooth Ear Buds - Black
prod_des: The Galaxy Buds were designed to provide a true screen-free experience for busy people on the go. Its adaptive dual microphone features an inner microphone and an outer microphone that work together to capture your voice more clearly during phone calls. With Ambient sound mode, you can hear your surroundings without the need to take off your ear buds. Its premium sound by AKG gives you an immersive listening experience. Plus, it supports the wireless power share feature for added convenience. With the Galaxy buds, discover truly clear sound and convenience that goes beyond your expectations.
feature: 58mAH lithium-ion batteryTruly wearable experience with long lasting battery life ( 6 hours buds and 7 hours case)Clear and crisp sound with sound by AKGEnhanced usability with wireless charging support and automatic sound switchingBattery - 58mAH for the earbuds and 252 mAh for the cradle/ case1 year manufacturer warranty
cust_review: Pros:-* Best design among the true wireless  earbuds. Doesn't stick out of the ears.* Compact charging case. Fits easily into  your jeans pocket.* Type-C charging case also supports  wireless charging. (Future proof)* Fits perfectly in the ears. (Most of us don't  have symmetrical ear canals so change the  eartips accordingly)* Ambient sound mode works well.* 5 hours battery life of the earbuds is  among the best.Cons:-* The charging case is able to charge the  earbuds only once but then again it's a  trade off for size.* Only IP X2 rated. So not possible to use in  the rain.* No internal storage like the previous IconXI don't know about the audio quality on non-Samsung devices but I'm using it with the Galaxy S8 with Dolby Atmos ON (music), EQ- Jazz, EQ(Galaxy wearable app)- Dynamic and tweaked the audio settings (battery life might take a slight hit) in the 'Developer Options' (screenshot provided)The audio sounds just too good after this.It's totally worth the price.***This pair of earbuds are just awesome from every corner. Nice bass and connectivity. Features were stunning nice as the single and multi touch functions make it work smooth and it connects to my OP5 with no time lag...😍***I have got this from Amazon. First I tried connecting with MI note 5, I really got shocked that volume is very low when I played a song.Then I thought that to return this product.But when I spoke with support team of Amazon, they told to try with multiple devices.I tried with Samsung device, it was excellent. And iam very impressed by its sensor and tapping system,Battery quality,fast charging and more.But one thing is this earbuds will support efficiently only with Samsung phones.***I was confused between apple airpod gen 2 and galaxy buds,but when i went to the store croma and do the trial of apple airpod and found apple airpod is lacking in terms of sound quality except of calling quality,at the same time my friend has his galaxy buds,and you wont believe apple airpod are not sound good as galaxy buds.Under 10k u have wireless case and premium quality ear buds which is easy to customise with extra pairs of rubber buds according to the ear size.But in apple case u have to spend extra 8k to get wireless case,So i think its not worth to go for apple airpodBut only the problem is if you are a apple user then u cant have access features of samsung app where u can changes the settings of ear buds.So this time samsung has nailed the market in less money with more features***They connect wonderfully with the S9 and are very comfortable in the ear and give no fatigue.Sound quality is okay. You have to keep it on hight volume to get good sound.Touch controls are not very responsive. They are hit or miss but i dont use them much so i am okay.Microphone are pahetic. You cant have a decent conversation on a phone call. Its a shame because they are so comfortable if they would have given good phone call quality. I would have given 5 star rating if not for the pathetic microphones.***I don't know about quality of product because when product delivered me seal was broken there are 2 seal one is manufacturer seal and second is another manufacturer seal was broken***I always wanted to buy a True wireless headphone for my one plus and thought of having Samsung Buds as it was the "BEST" option available with type C but I was mistaken.The earphones sound very bad(2 out of 10).The MI wired  earphone for 399 sounded way better.Other issues are that one of the earphone losses its connectivity with the other.While using it with my laptop I can hear the sound echo as the buds are not truly synced and have some millisecond delay .Never the less here are some pros:1)Very Light Weight and dont fall off the ear at all.Great fit.2)Supports Type CCons1)Sound very bad(No great base or mids)2)Cracking sound while hearing music3)Earphones randomly disconnect4)The Left and the right loose sync and the sounds seem to echo.While using it with the phone in my pocket I often hear cracking sounds while a song is playing.Its a big disappointment and definitely not work the 10K price.***Writing this review after nearly 1 month of use with my Galaxy S8 Plus.1. Sound Quality - 3/5 without using Dolby Atmos mode.The moment you turn on that mode, this becomes 5/5.The best thing is you can use the Galaxy Wearable app to highly customize the sound quality depending on your listening style. I personally prefer Bass Boost mode.2. Design and Build - 5/5. These tiny cool looking buds will make you fall in love with them from the 1st day. With a number of cool features in them, they make the benchmark of your expectation.3. Call Quality - 4/5. Though managable, clarity is a bit low while on a call.4. Battery Life - 4/5. The buds can be used continuously for 6 to 7 hours. The only problem is case battery life is around 7 to 8 hours. I use them for 5 to 6 hours on a weekday. So I have to charge the case in every 2 to 3 days.Overall, the Galaxy Buds are a pretty good buy. If you own a Galaxy Phone and want to buy a mid to high range truely wireless earphones, don't think too much. This is the one for you.***

prod_des: LAVA Z81 is the latest offering by Lava in its premium Z Series. LAVA Z81 has the Photo Studio feature which includes modes such as Stage light , Stage light mono, natural, vibrant , contour and splash in its camera segment which is a first in its category. The Face Unlock eliminates the need of pin and pattern passwords by enabling the customers to unlock their phones with their face. It is super secure as phone captures 126 points on the face while registering it. The Full View display enhances the watching experience with the device. The blue colour of Z81 comes with a glass-finish on the back which is achieved by OPVD process. 13 MP Rear Camera with F2.2 aperture and 13 MP front camera with F2.0 aperture allow increased light and higher focus which lets you capture brighter and sharper images. Latest camera features like AR Stickers, Super Night, Intelligent Selfie, Filter, Template, Panorama, Sound Picture, Child Mode and Bokeh Mode enhance your camera usage experience. Apart from this; OTG support enables you to transfer data from other devices.

cust_review: The best. I was not expecting this quality product from Mi. The sound is simply amazing and the best thing is the Bass. The sound at 100% is really loud enough, will fill up an average big hall. Coming to battery it's reasonable. Fill last about 3-4 hours at 100% volume and if used in 80% to 100% it lasts upto 4-5 hours. it doesn't come with battery indicator but for iOS, Redmi and Lenovo phones it will show the percentage in phone itself. I bought it for 1,799rs I wish it came for a bit cheap maybe 1,500. But for its size and compact ability it's really amazing.***I have been an MI fan but this speaker turned out to be a nightmare..Amazon packaging was so poor..Volume is just ok..it has been only a week or so.but NO BATTERY LIFE AT ALL..Doesn't get charged..NEED MY MONEY BACK***Plus this also shows battery level in your phone itself (if you're using Apple or Mi phones, otherwise you have to install an app called BatON; I'm in no way affiliated with this app and it may or may not work for you)Bass is good for a speaker this size, battery right now lasts for ~7 hours at 80% volume which is really good. This has 15 level volume. Range is pretty good at around 7 - 8 meters even with a wall in between.Build Quality is MIs strong suit in my opinion. Buttons have a good tactile feedback and metal feels really premium.Haven't found any cons right now but will update this review whenever I do.***Beautiful, compatible, looks premium, decent sound***Speaker has suicidal tendencies...dont keep it near table end....one good bass and it will push itself off the table...mi should add some grip to its base..***I liked the overall performance of this speaker. If specified, it is portable, not much, but very.. it's very portable. It's lightweight and doesn't slip off of hands.Big disadvantage (mostly for the people with lightning or type c lifestyle) is it doesn't come with micro usb cable... Yes, cable is not added in the box and you'll be ending up purchasing a new cable or borrowing one from your colleague(s).Anyway, it sounds good. Good for light music and the highs gets a little muffled when volume is turned up to more than 75 percent. Mids are nice and lows are okay. Bass could have been a bit heavy but it's okay for a fair use and for the price.3.8/5 stars overall***Best Bluetooth speaker . Strongly recommend . I got it in 1780/- only . Clear sound , very loud , bass booster , it runs 1 hour in low battery also. Only thing you have to be worry is it's grip on surface , it moves with high base sounds so try placing it well so it won't fall down.***I am writing this review after 3 months used and i found it great sound quality is goodLoud enough for a single roomBest thing is the battery backup if you r using it with 50% volume the battery will last long as 10 hours but if u r using in its full volume with bass then only 3 to 4 hours.***

cust_review: I brought the phone on 31st May and by 12th sept I had to submit the phone at service centre as it stopped working suddenly.  I submitted my phone at Vashi telecom - PTS. They changed the motherboard and returned the phone after 3days. After recieving from service centre, the mic is not working properly. I went to the same service centre again and they said it is because of dust. They cleaned and returned the phone and after one day again I am facing the same issue. Highly disappointed with the phone. Paid so much and after 3 months I am running around service centres.***Writing this review after 1 week of usage. Most reviews have highlighted the Pro's very well - great looks, good camera, acceptable performance. I would like to point out the Con's that has come to my notice.1. Battery performance - Very bad. Turbo charge is over-rated. It does not charge in 15 minutes. It takes approx. 45-50 minutes to go from 20% to 100%. Charging is faster when battery is low. With time, charging speed slows down.Battery discharges pretty quickly too. It hardly lasts 25-30 hours despite the fact that I don't play mobile games or watch videos on my phone.2. I was using Lenovo Vibe K5 note before this phone. It was cheaper, but had some really handy tools which I miss badly in this phone. Example: Screenshot option in Quick access pull-down menu, Hands-free Gesture capture in Selfie camera, background app management in Settings->power manager which would allow me to customize completely which app can run in the background, which I cannot do here.3. Internal memory - Mine is a 32GB variant and when I unboxed the phone, more than 16GB is already being used by the system memory which is incredible! You cannot ever free this memory so 50% of your storage is gone even before you start using your phone.4. Notification lights - So Motorola has stopped providing notification lights, which means you have to turn the screen on every time to check if you have any new notification or if charging is complete. There are apps to fix this in the play store, and also a feature by Motorola which shows you notification every time you pick up the phone, but these options drain your already-depleted battery.5. Camera - I'll admit that the camera was the main reason why I bought this model. I have gone through numerous Youtube videos to assess the quality. I'm not using Google camera but the pre-loaded Camera app. I will not say that the camera is bad but it misses some very basic tools present in cheaper phones. Example: ability to click selfies without having to touch the screen (face-detection/hand-gesture/smile detection) and if you click selfie in portrait mode, then you cannot turn on face beauty feature, which means you have to choose any one between face beauty or bokeh mode, which is so crappy!6. Updates - This is not a con, rather an observation. I had to spend almost 4GB data and >4 hours updating this phone from Nougat to Oreo.Overall, I will say this is value for money because I bought it for just 11k.***Moto x4 awesome mobile.Best Camera.Best mobile feature.Best body.Fast charging.Only problem is while charging phone heats up.***🍇Battery life  18 hours without playing games..  only on using net like video and browsing..🍇Battery charger is good speed..  charging in half hour 80% of battery.,🍒 good screen and gorilla glass ..no problem with drop from hand..🍇Good looking and free handle with one hand.🍇PUBG game we can 4 hours only..🍇 Android pie update available..🍇 Overall is good.🍇Camera quality is good.🍇 Front camera excellentNegative is.  Two 4g sim (jio sim) not able to use at a time...***=> DesignWell, Motorola X4 has very beautiful back view, it looks premium. It has corning gorrilla glass at back glass too. Very handy phone. I loved the design  So i will give for design (10/10)=> DisplayThis display is small if you are looking for a big phone, but for me it is best it handy. and It has corning gorrila 4 protection on dispaly (9/10)=> BatteryI like the battery backup of phone. with just 3000mAh battery it perform well. And Its TURBO POWER is  very Usefull (8/10)=> SoftwareMotorola made a new UI in this phone which much better than previous ones.i will give ( 9/10 )=> CameraIf you are looking for camera phone. Then it will good choice. front camera is good . and it has good rear camera too. Front 16 MP is excellent for a good selfie. Camera performation is perfect . score (8/10)=> performanceYes, It offer a lag free experience . It has good ram management . It has snapdragon 630(10/10)=> MY experienceWell it is outdated model but i loved the phone. becaue it is handy. and perform wellvery durable phone, I loved it***This is an excellent phone.Pros :-dust resistant, water proof, type c, good battery, excellent primary camera, fast charging and fits in one hand.Cons : -not value for money ( i bought it with a heavy discount and exchange).front camera could be better.speakers are average.***Smooth & premium look .Cam is for better than note 5 pro !Display is so soft & sensitive to use ...Battery is decent , but not as note 5 pro..."Type C port "Buy it for 10k and lesser .... Wait for offers ! If your buying for 11k _ pls go for 64gb with 4gb ram for 12k !Go for it worth the price .....***I see some lag few times. Finger print is so sensitive that most of the times I have to use pin to unlock. Camera is good with features. Auto brightness does not work, most of the times I got to do manually. I used Moto models before, but being a new edition I don't feel any difference from previous models except OS pie. Do not want to spend again for new phone, so just using it but I do not suggest...***

feature: 5.8-inch Super Retina display (OLED) with HDR1IP68 dust and water resistant (maximum depth of 2 metres up to 30 minutes)212MP dual cameras with dual OIS and 7MP TrueDepth front camera — Portrait mode, Portrait Lighting, Depth Control and Smart HDRFace ID for secure authentication3A12 Bionic with next-generation Neural EngineWireless charging—works with Qi chargersiOS 12 with Memoji, Screen Time, Siri Shortcuts, and Group FaceTime
cust_review: Best phone.... An iPhone is an iPhone... Like no other!***Finally I decided to go with Apple as it now has an LED screen instead of IPS LCD screens that Iphone 8+ and previous versions had.. ( I also used my dads iphoneX for around 2 months and decided to go for this when I was convinced) Though it is expensive, i believe its worth the money.. I feel its much more secure than Android and its not forcing me to have Facebook, Youtube etc that my Previous Samsung phones always did... Just to let y’ll know that I was a big fan of samsung.. I have used Note 1,2,3,4,8 S4, S7 edge etc.. Though its screen was good.. they use to slow down after some time of use.. I purchased an Apple only after positive reviews from my friends and I am loving this so far.. 3 GB RAM in iphone x or 4 GB RAM here in iPhone XS is far better than 6 GB ram in a Samsung.. I also play PUBG and I am also loving the Gaming experience.. Very important, it runs on High graphics mode where as my Note 8 use to work on medium graphics even when I used the mobile on Gaming, High performance or Entertainment mode... So, I am loving my iPhone so far..And the face ID is just awesome...***Too much .. just too much ‘heating ‘Same in hands as iPhone X***As a tech and apple enthusiast : This is one beautiful piece of tech and engineering marvel . From its seem less design to its attention to minute details (thx to the designing team behind it) , it will force you to agree that its insane price tag is justified the moment you hold it . I can never believe myself  of how much my views have changed about this product and Apple from it release to the moment I had it in my hands .Well if you want to know specs and comparisons well you have youtube , there are plenty of reviews there but if you are ready to buy such an expensive piece without selling your kidney then those reviews and comparisons don't matter to you I guess .My review :Camera : trustworthy , reliable , takes very aggressive HDR shots at times but generally neutral with its performance , you will find yourself editing the pictures a lot and I never complained it as I love doing it and when the base material is so detailed and accurate to begin with that you never lose any significant amount of quality after many editing cycles .Battery : Respectable AF ! Never expected this from a sub par capacity battery , while it is not the best , its at a very respectable position for sure  , it surely will surprise you once you use it .Speed : The king of phones in speed period .Design : 10/10Negatives - Face ID doesn't work in landscape , Charges slow .***Disappointed due the Camera of Xs (In low light/indoor photography face output will be totally artificial). In comparison with my old iPhone6s, I vote for 6s for low light/indoor photography. (I am not talking about selfie camera issue. I identified issue with main camera)Contacted Apple service centre and their response is “that is how iPhone X & iPhone Xs designed”Raised issue to Apple customer care number and shared the sample pics and other required data to analyse. Apple customer care came back to me after a week asking pictures by providing multiple scenarios. I have seen similar post for iPhone Xs MAX with the same issue in apple forum and the final response from Apple is: check lighting while taking pics.I am not sure why very less people has raised this issue in Xs Camera reviews (started digging more and observed in reviews only after facing the issue)Please note that, iPhone can’t be returned to Amazon without the approval from Apple. Apple don’t agree it’s as issue. Totally disappointed.This might be best Camera in some scenarios, but for me it’s a total disappointment.***Feeling cheated. Nothing wrong with the product. But i saw an ad on insta mentioning iphone xs max 256gb at 1.09 nd here i have an iphone xs 256gb.I dearly wanted an xs max model and now there are not ready to exchange even if i am ready to buy a new one.***Personally i feel the XS is a complete phone. My last Iphone 6 worked flawlessly for 3 yearsI was confused between note 9, xs, one plus 6T and other latest handsets.Finally chose IOS over android as it is more polished than android and the apps in my opinion work better on an IOSDid not go for the Max as i prefer the smaller size.Price is definitely high and i got it in a nice deal from amazon which knocked off 20k on the price tagPlus got free screen replacement cover, no interest EMITips:Wait for a SALE to get maximum savings. This phone is worth it if you are getting it at a good deal. get a cover***While purchasing the item it has been shown that it comes under no EMI cost. But when I received my first credit card statement it shows EMI amount plus interest plus GST cost. Pls clarify.***

A powerful 2.2 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 660 AIE octa-core processor, a (12 MP + 2 MP) dual-rear camera, a massive 16-cm (6.3) FHD+ Dot Notch Display and features such as AI Scene Detection, Face Unlock, and IR Remote Control come together to provide you with a transcendental smartphone experience. Experience power and performance in your palm with the Redmi Note 7. Every picture that you click comes out beautiful, thanks to its (12 MP + 2 MP) dual-rear camera and the 13 MP front camera. While 16-cm (6.3) FHD+ Dot Notch Display revolutionises your viewing experience, features such as AI Scene Detection, Face Unlock and IR Remote Control make your user experience as convenient as possible. Its (12 MP + 2 MP) dual-rear camera setup lets you capture every moment perfectly. With its high-quality sensors, along with AI-based algorithms, you can take stunning Bokeh shots. feature: 10.5-inch Retina display with True Tone and wide colorA12 Bionic chipTouch ID fingerprint sensor and Apple Pay8MP back camera, 7MP FaceTime HD front cameraStereo speakers802.11ac Wi-Fi and Gigabit-class LTE cellular dataUp to 10 hours of battery lifeLightning connector for charging and accessories
cust_review: The oddly satisfying iPad and this is my first Apple product... This iPad is simply amazing... I bought it before a month... The edges are well protected and it's build quality is also good... Let's talk about pros and consPros:1) Processor: A12 bionic embedded with M12 co processor... The line itself makes everyone feel amazing because one of the fastest processors in the world and because of its nueral engine the optimization is superb and never experienced any problem.2)Battery life: If you are a gamer don't get so disappointed because for gaming it lasts upto 7hours of continuous gaming... And for normal users you can expect the battery life for 1 to 3 days depending upon your usage...3) Display: being a 226ppi retina display it is simply magnificent... Your eyes won't get damaged no need to worry at that point ... And thanks to it p3 wide colour gamut.4) Weight and Design: The interesting thing is it weighs only 456 grams no other mobile iPad feels this light. You won't get the feel of holding a large brick in your hand, you will like you are holding a thin 6.1mm paper.5) Camera: Compared to the latest 48 MP mobiles and tablets, this iPad rocks in day light. Both front and back are nice and performing wellCons:1) Charger: The power brick provided in the box to charge the iPad is somewhat disappointing... It's getting heat easily...2) Cable: Lighting cable is the unsatisfying thing and the quality of the cable is also somewhat disappointing... If it would have type c it would be a beast...That's it. It's a wonderful product compared to everything...***The Apple India app store is limited both in terms of apps and reviews. Heat issue completely collapse their other important work. At the time of purchase I really got some problems in switching apps and other some minor issues. Now it’s cleared after the update from apple. So now also I believe after one or more (few) update, the heating issue will be cleared.  Whatever it is, I really disappointed (as a apple fan(user)) about iPad Air.***iPad is Awesome... But security options are poor to protect from hacking by other apple devices. Touchid is not working properly. Passcode dependent to unlock your device...Lengthy recovery, if we have single apple device when forgot password/passcode***What a very convenient device this is! Absolutely fantastic experience. I’ve purchased the Smart Keyboard as well and I’d say the combo is really good to use. Way better than any laptop IMO if your purpose is not for coding/gaming.***Overall its good. Thanks.***After using ipad 4 for 7 years it was a real perfect upgrade for me as now ipad is offering better utility functions and good battery is also a plus point***

cust_review: Best phone.... An iPhone is an iPhone... Like no other!***Finally I decided to go with Apple as it now has an LED screen instead of IPS LCD screens that Iphone 8+ and previous versions had.. ( I also used my dads iphoneX for around 2 months and decided to go for this when I was convinced) Though it is expensive, i believe its worth the money.. I feel its much more secure than Android and its not forcing me to have Facebook, Youtube etc that my Previous Samsung phones always did... Just to let y’ll know that I was a big fan of samsung.. I have used Note 1,2,3,4,8 S4, S7 edge etc.. Though its screen was good.. they use to slow down after some time of use.. I purchased an Apple only after positive reviews from my friends and I am loving this so far.. 3 GB RAM in iphone x or 4 GB RAM here in iPhone XS is far better than 6 GB ram in a Samsung.. I also play PUBG and I am also loving the Gaming experience.. Very important, it runs on High graphics mode where as my Note 8 use to work on medium graphics even when I used the mobile on Gaming, High performance or Entertainment mode... So, I am loving my iPhone so far..And the face ID is just awesome...***Too much .. just too much ‘heating ‘Same in hands as iPhone X***As a tech and apple enthusiast : This is one beautiful piece of tech and engineering marvel . From its seem less design to its attention to minute details (thx to the designing team behind it) , it will force you to agree that its insane price tag is justified the moment you hold it . I can never believe myself  of how much my views have changed about this product and Apple from it release to the moment I had it in my hands .Well if you want to know specs and comparisons well you have youtube , there are plenty of reviews there but if you are ready to buy such an expensive piece without selling your kidney then those reviews and comparisons don't matter to you I guess .My review :Camera : trustworthy , reliable , takes very aggressive HDR shots at times but generally neutral with its performance , you will find yourself editing the pictures a lot and I never complained it as I love doing it and when the base material is so detailed and accurate to begin with that you never lose any significant amount of quality after many editing cycles .Battery : Respectable AF ! Never expected this from a sub par capacity battery , while it is not the best , its at a very respectable position for sure  , it surely will surprise you once you use it .Speed : The king of phones in speed period .Design : 10/10Negatives - Face ID doesn't work in landscape , Charges slow .***Disappointed due the Camera of Xs (In low light/indoor photography face output will be totally artificial). In comparison with my old iPhone6s, I vote for 6s for low light/indoor photography. (I am not talking about selfie camera issue. I identified issue with main camera)Contacted Apple service centre and their response is “that is how iPhone X & iPhone Xs designed”Raised issue to Apple customer care number and shared the sample pics and other required data to analyse. Apple customer care came back to me after a week asking pictures by providing multiple scenarios. I have seen similar post for iPhone Xs MAX with the same issue in apple forum and the final response from Apple is: check lighting while taking pics.I am not sure why very less people has raised this issue in Xs Camera reviews (started digging more and observed in reviews only after facing the issue)Please note that, iPhone can’t be returned to Amazon without the approval from Apple. Apple don’t agree it’s as issue. Totally disappointed.This might be best Camera in some scenarios, but for me it’s a total disappointment.***Feeling cheated. Nothing wrong with the product. But i saw an ad on insta mentioning iphone xs max 256gb at 1.09 nd here i have an iphone xs 256gb.I dearly wanted an xs max model and now there are not ready to exchange even if i am ready to buy a new one.***Personally i feel the XS is a complete phone. My last Iphone 6 worked flawlessly for 3 yearsI was confused between note 9, xs, one plus 6T and other latest handsets.Finally chose IOS over android as it is more polished than android and the apps in my opinion work better on an IOSDid not go for the Max as i prefer the smaller size.Price is definitely high and i got it in a nice deal from amazon which knocked off 20k on the price tagPlus got free screen replacement cover, no interest EMITips:Wait for a SALE to get maximum savings. This phone is worth it if you are getting it at a good deal. get a cover***While purchasing the item it has been shown that it comes under no EMI cost. But when I received my first credit card statement it shows EMI amount plus interest plus GST cost. Pls clarify.***

cust_review: I am very much sad to write this review...I have bought Note 9 on 29th Oct, mobile looked and worked as a brand new. But exactly after 8,9 days I got speaker issues... when I am receiving any incoming calls or when I am making any outgoing calls automatically loudspeaker is turned On... while talking in phone without pressing the loudspeaker button automatically it turned On... when I am looking the loudspeaker button it indicates OFF..Same thing when I am hearing songs in loudspeaker sometimes only top speaker working and sometimes only bottom speaker is working...I have googled this issue and found so many people facing the same issue with Note 9 speakers but there is no answers from Samsung...One of the top brand phone having this kind of issues unable to digest...Now I am fighting with Amazon for the replacement...Amazon and seller should help me on this...***Here's the thing...If you buy this device now(i.e. Before note 10 and note 9 price falls) then you would get the best mobile ever in the market but..if u will wait for the price to drop then you'll get best deal ever..choice is your.Anyways about mobile..1. DisplayBest display ever.Fun fact- when the display settings is kept in 1080p then you will only experience 319ppi..so i highly recommend to keep in quad hd+..it hardly uses 30min of your total battery usages.2. PerformanceSnappy as ever..No complaints there.3. BatteryWhen I heard note 9 has 4000mah battery I was hyped because 4000mah battery with very very efficient 9810 processor (10nm chip), Samsung's optimization.. I should get some really good battery life..but that's not the case.. don't get me wrong its has whole day long..but i expected little more.I am getting around 5-5.5 hrs of screen on time daily (with 1.5hr of pubg,2 hr of Netflix streaming,1hr of YouTube and social media on an average day)4.Camera NO Complaints there either.But live focus(portrait mode)on selfie camera needs to be improved.Edge detection is OK but it softens the photo a lot and i mean a lot.5. BuitIt should last 5 years easily.And it has IP68(water and dust resistance)Note- i went for metallic copper colour because of those anodised metal part(the metal frame of the phone).Any small scrap or scratch would be more visible on blue colour and despite of black being my favourite colour i didn't go for black because it doesn't stand out. Its too ordinary for me.!Honourable mention-Speakers are phenomenal,iris scan works perfect, fingerprint scanner is fast, button are clicky,s pen works fine.Verdict-Best phone you can buy right now.And remember S-Pen is great bonus.***One month review: Everything is just amazing. Only thing I was afraid of was on how long it would take to charge but after testing it I hardly even noticed that it finished charging. Great phone overall. 🔥💙After using it for one month usually other phones would slow down but with this I hardly even noticed a difference it's still fast and perfect for gaming. Yet I still haven't found a single problem with it other than the fact that it's a fingerprint magnet. I do reccomend good cases like UAG or Spigen as the phone is front and back glass so if u drop it , it will crack but repair cost is not too expensive so dont worry. Oh and if you find the Bixby button annoying that when u try to increase the volume you pressed the Bixby button by mistake then an update came where u can toggle a switch to make it so that u have to double press the button to activate Bixby. Otherwise Samsung great job👏👏***First of all phone gets heated up dispite no usage. It takes 3 hours to full charge. Battery drains considerably. No Android P out of the box. Very Fragile. One fall and back glass crack. Screen protector can't be applied due to curve display. Even back cover provided by Samsung doesnt fit properly.  Overall disappointed. prod_des: The Nokia 3.1 runs Android 8.0 Oreo, as part of the Android One programme, out-of-the-box. It sports a 5.2-inch HD+ (720x1440 pixels) display with an 18:9 aspect ratio and Corning Gorilla Glass protection. The handset is powered by an octa-core MediaTek MT6750 SoC, coupled with up to 3GB of RAM.
feature: 13MP primary camera and 8MP front facing camera13.208 centimeters (5.2-inch) capacitive touchscreen with 1280 x 720 pixels resolutionAndroid v8 Oreo operating system with 1.5GHz MT6750N quad core processor, 3GB RAM, 32GB internal memory expandable up to 128GB and dual SIM dual-standby (4G+4G)2990mAH lithium-ion battery, Bluetooth: 4.2 V and Sensors Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
cust_review: The reason for buying Nokia 3.1 is primarily due to my two requirements: 1. stock Android, 2. small screen size. Moto G6 & E5 were dropped due to larger screen.• Phone size is ideal for single-handed use. It is sleek and feels good to hold.• Stock Android running 8.0. 3GB RAM plus lack of bloatware will help in smooth performance in the long run.• Blue/Copper colour looks better than the black version. Copper ring around the front panel looks classy.• Available internal storage is about 22GB. Dual sim + micro SD card.• Camera is decent. Highest video recording is HD 1080p for rear camera & HD 720p for front. Slow motion & Time lapse feature.• Rear camera has a small bump.• In-built FM radio.• Built quality is good.• Battery easily lasts more than a day.• At 139gms, it is lightweight and easy to carry around.• Should have provided USB Type-C port.• When on a call, there is noticeable vibration felt on the back panel. This is mostly coming from the earpiece.• Speaker can often get covered while watching videos.• No LED notification light in the front.• Lower bezel is huge. Home/back buttons are placed on-screen. What a waste of real estate!• The side & back panels are very smooth and is prone to slippage. Case is much needed.• Should have been priced lower (MRP 12k at the time of review). For someone not particular about stock android, better options are available.***Phone was due for software update. As soon as i setup the phone i got Official OTA software upgrade prompt. Initially software update failed multiple times. Then in another try it just went into boot loop and now it will now switch on. It just restarts automatically and just shows white screen with Android One logo and restarts again. Want to return.***I just got the phone today and I am now facing technical issues with the phone. The phone automatically switches on and off. I contacted the Nokia helpline and they suggested to return the phone in Amazon. After that, I contacted the Amazon helpline and they helped me set up an appointment with a technician tomorrow. I would suggest going with other brands while buying a mobile phone. Maybe Nokia is not what it used to be. Anyway, I'll post a review after the technician visit tomorrow.***I bought this phone on 23rd Feb and received it the next day. On starting the phone, Google prompted for the latest software update. But after the update, the phone goes into an endless boot up cycle - the Android One logo keeps coming on and off over and over again. Now I am waiting for the tech guy to visit me, cant even return this phone. Not happy, not happy at all.***Okay product. Some of functions doesn't work satisfactorily. Android version is not upto mark. Too small display of icons (32 on one screen). Overall disappointed with Nokia.***I actually brought this smartphone phone for someone else. Someone not so tech-savvy. But for the price this phone offers a lot of features. The person I bought for was thrilled to have it. She wasn't expecting these many features at this price point especially from a Brand like Nokia. The build and screen quality is above par. Great battery life and timely software updates make this a great proposition. But screen size is too small I guess. That's one area one would be disappointed while considering to buy this phone. If you are tight on budget, then you should consider Nokia in your options. Nokia does offers a great value for money products.***Cons: The phone heats within 5 min of talk time.Had a discussion with Nokia chat on their support site. Nokia tech support suggests me to switch off mobile data to avoid the heating issue. I do not understand the need of purchasing a 4G phone when the suer has to switch off 4G data to use the phone.An additional suggestion from Nokia tech support is not to worry about the heating. Pathetic response.Please avoid purchasing this phone.***The phone was not functional out of the box - it got stuck in boot screen as soon as the update ran on turning on the phone and is un-usable.  While products can sometimes be defective, what is appalling is the customer service provided by Amazon.  1) In spite of a 10 day return policy advertised for defective products, Amazon refused to take it back 2) They made us jump through hoops like installing additional apps, call at very specific times before connecting with someone 3) Leave alone apologizing for a damaged product, the support technician was asking why we did not initiate return on the same day on receipt, expecting us to stop everything we are doing and set up phone as soon as package was receives. 4) Provided trouble shooting tips that demonstrated zero knowledge of product - kept asking to charge phone 5) Now - more than a week since the issue, we have to make time to meet their technician, who will spend who knows how many days on this, before *maybe* offering a replacement.  Net net - we still don't have a phone that works after a week, and have been forced to purchase another phone.Amazon has a reputation of great customer service in the US, but it is really sad to see how they treat consumers in  India.  Experiences like these are why the Indian consumer doesn't trust and hesitates to use e-commerce.I hope the Amazon India head Amit Agarwal reads this, and improves the customer experience.***

cust_review: True it’s not a replacement for laptop, but except word document or excel sheet this iPad will do everything for you and with the help of Apple Pencil you somehow start loving the way it works. Still there are things i need to do on laptop. But watching movies and stuff was nevere so fun. The best part is battery life....processor is awesome but in terms of battery life its a beast. Only downside is that i didn’t got the gst invoice. Amazon fooled me saying you will get gst invoice if ur a business user. Apart from this no issues with this purchase.***Ipad has always been the go to tablet. The apps just work better on an iPad than any other tablet. You simply can't get a better tablet than an iPad. Plenty of storage(128gig).,good battery life and great performance.. Only tiny downside is that you can cleary see the gap between the display and the glass***Its apple what can you expect.... Totally superb product.....light weight.... performance good...battery life is nice....in short wthevr they have mentioned in product description its exactly like  that ..so far hvnt met with any issue with product ......jst bit expensive but totally worthy....i was bit worried wthr i will get genuine product or not ,bt thanks to amazon for providing nice product at less price....***It was a substantial sum I was putting out. Never bought expensive items without checking and feeling and seeing in front of your eyes. When it came, it came sealed with specific markers that ensured the item is genuine. A value for money product and thanks a lot amazon for bringing out such great offers with on time delivery.***

Product_name: Samsung S-View Flip Cover for Samsung Galaxy S 6 Edge - Retail Packaging - Clear Gold/Gold
prod_des: The S-View Flip Cover, Clear allows you to see through the entire front folio, a perfect complement to your stylish Galaxy S 6 edge, and interact with incoming calls, alarms and events. The Samsung Galaxy S 6 edge S-View Flip Cover, Clear protects your entire handset, including your screen, when it is not in use and is easily flipped open for full access to your device. When closed, the S-View Cover, Clear offers instant, full screen access to critical information, thanks to the Samsung ID chip. Press the power key to check the time, weather and other status items like missed calls and texts. Accept or reject incoming calls with just a swipe through the front folio. The S-View Cover, Clear allows you to see through the entire front folio, a perfect complement to your stylish Galaxy S 6 edge, and interact with incoming calls, alarms and events. The Perfect Combination of Style and Functionality The Samsung Galaxy S 6 edge S-View Flip Cover, Clear was developed with your busy lifestyle in mind. This smart case, designed to protect and enhance the Samsung Galaxy S 6 edge, is the perfect combination of style and functionality. The S-View Cover, Clear is available in multiple attractive tinted transparent colors, and with the innovative S-View design, you'll keep your phone protected without missing important information. All Around Protection with Smart Features The Samsung S-View Flip Cover, Clear protects the smartphone's screen when it is not in use and is easily flipped open for full access to your device. The Samsung Galaxy S 6 edge S-View Flip Cover, Clear will power on your Galaxy smartphone when opened and power down your main display when closed - a convenient option for those needing quick access to their phone's features but are still looking for all-around protection.
